rules_text:
When Miyoi enters, create two Food tokens. [i](They're artifacts with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
Foods you control have “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to or by target creature this turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.”
notes:
Onboard mulligan on combat, if troublesome consider Flash and gains this ability UEOT as per Grapple's advice
